about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of intrepid explorers Tyler, Daniel, and Alice as they embark on a legendary journey to uncover the lost city of Atlantis in this Time Management tycoon game. Your adventure begins in the dense jungles, where ancient clues lead you across deserts, mountains, and beneath the ocean's surface. Solve complex puzzles, collect valuable relics, and battle mercenaries as you unravel the mysteries of an advanced civilization lost to time.

With each level offering unique challenges, you'll need to think strategically and act quickly to overcome obstacles and unlock hidden paths. Explore visually stunning environments, from the scorching sands of Egypt to the icy expanses of Antarctica. Along the way, you'll gather resources, repair ancient mechanisms, and piece together the story of a once-great civilization.

'Expedition Chronicles' is more than just a puzzle game – it's a journey through history, mythology, and adventure. With immersive gameplay, captivating storytelling, and a host of bonus content, this game offers endless hours of exploration and discovery. Are you ready to uncover Atlantis' secrets?

Features

  • Enjoy 50 playable levels with engaging challenges.

  • Explore diverse environments: jungles, deserts, and oceans.

  • Solve intricate puzzles and unlock hidden secrets.

  • Collect relics and uncover the story of Atlantis.

  • Immerse yourself in rich storytelling and stunning visuals.

  • Upgrade buildings and craft tools for your journey.

  • Replay levels to earn 3 stars and unlock rewards.

  • Enjoy casual gameplay with engaging challenges.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board

name: Expedition Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/Windows® 8/Windows® 10/Windows® 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: With OpenAL support

short_description: Embark on an adventurous quest through jungles, deserts, and oceans to uncover the lost city of Atlantis. Solve puzzles and unlock ancient secrets!
